flawed_nl_solution:
After one year he earns $200 in interest because 1000 x 0.2 = <<1000*0.2=200.0>>200.0
After one year it has $1,200 in the account because 1000 + 200.0 = <<1000+200.0=1200.0>>1200.0
He takes out $600 because 1200.0 / 2 = <<1200.0/2=60.0>>60.0
After this it has $600 in it because 1200.0 - 60.0 = <<1200.0-60.0=1140.0>>1140.0
She earns $90 in interest because 1140.0 x 0.15 = <<1140.0*0.15=171.0>>171.0
The account now has $1311.0 because 1140.0 + 171.0 = <<1140.0+171.0=1311.0>>1311.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 600.0, not 60.0. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
